title: Lead poisoning: the hidden epidemic
brief_description: The film for the first time puts the problem of lead poisoning in young children in its proper perspective with an authentic “case history” of the problems in all its aspects. Through scenes and persons the comments of physicians and laboratory technicians, the film shows why lead poisoning is so often undetected and goes on killing untold numbers of children.
